com.twilio4j.twiml
Class Say

java.lang.Object
  com.twilio4j.twiml.TwiML
      com.twilio4j.twiml.Say
All Implemented Interfaces:
NestInGather, ToXML
public class Say
extends TwiML
implements NestInGather

This class directly reflects the Say verb documented at http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml/say All of the descriptions included in these javadoc comments come directly from the twilio website.

Author:
broc.seib@gentomi.com

Constructor Detail

Say

public Say(java.lang.String phrase)

The 'Say' verb converts text to speech that is read back to the caller. 'Say' is useful for development or saying dynamic text that is difficult to pre-record.

Parameters:
phrase - The text Twilio will read to the caller. Limited to 4KB.
Method Detail

toXml

public void toXml(java.lang.StringBuilder buf,
                  java.lang.String baseUrl)
Converts this object into XML. This function is normally called by the state machine servlet and not called directly by you.

Specified by:
toXml in interface ToXML
Overrides:
toXml in class TwiML

voice

public Say voice(Say.Voice v)
The 'voice' attribute allows you to choose a male or female voice to read text back. The default value is 'man'.

Parameters:
v - Allowed values: Voice.man, or Voice.woman. Default value: Voice.man.
Returns:
this object so more attributes may be chained.

voiceMAN

public Say voiceMAN()
This is the same as calling voice(Voice.man), but less annoying to utilize.

Returns:
this object so more attributes may be chained.

voiceWOMAN

public Say voiceWOMAN()
This is the same as calling voice(Voice.woman), but less annoying to utilize.

Returns:
this object so more attributes may be chained.

language

public Say language(Say.Language language)
The 'language' attribute allows you pick a voice with a specific language's accent and pronunciations. Twilio currently supports languages 'en' (English), 'es' (Spanish), 'fr' (French), and 'de' (German). The default is 'en'.

Parameters:
language - Allowed values: Language.en, Language.es, Language.fr, and Language.de. Default value: Language.en
Returns:
this object so more attributes may be chained.

languageEN

public Say languageEN()
Convenience function that does the same as calling language(Language.en).

Returns:
this object so more attributes may be chained.

public Say languageES()
Convenience function that does the same as calling language(Language.es).

Returns:
this object so more attributes may be chained.

public Say languageFR()
Convenience function that does the same as calling language(Language.fr).

Returns:
this object so more attributes may be chained.

languageDE

public Say languageDE()
Convenience function that does the same as calling language(Language.de).

Returns:
this object so more attributes may be chained.

loop

public Say loop(int loopCount)
The 'loop' attribute specifies how many times you'd like the text repeated. The default is once. Specifying '0' will cause the the verb to loop until the call is hung up.

Parameters:
loopCount - Must be >=0. Default value is 1.
Returns:
this object so more attributes may be chained.
